articles.title: NASA Scientists Zoomed In on the Ocean — Then Spotted a Tiny Red Creature That Keeps Whales Alive - Indian Defence Review
articles.description: Off the New England coast, critically endangered whales are feeding on invisible swarms of red plankton—now suddenly visible from hundreds of miles above.
articles.content: Far off the New England coast, NASAs Aqua satellite has detected massive clouds of tiny red planktonCalanus finmarchicuscritical to the survival of the North Atlantic right whale, one of the most end… [+4588 chars]
